about.summary: An extension for colcon-core to fetch and manage package metadata from repositories.

name: colcon-metadata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "colcon-metadata" %}
{% set version = "0.2.2" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://github.com/colcon/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 423d20ac212657c39dcecacfa55d9f208d9bb178ea275ec21104de0ac7912125

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.5
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - colcon-core
    - PyYAML

test:
  imports:
    - {{ name.replace("-", "_") }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/colcon/{{ name }}
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: |
    An extension for colcon-core to fetch and manage package metadata from repositories.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - seanyen
    - wolfv
